content: In large part, the buzz-kill buzz cut is an act against your own vanity. Like Cass’s ugly self-harm, the buzz cut says to the world, “I’m getting rid of this thing because I know how much you like it.” Which is why, in most any movie scene, the man shaving his own head is shown looking back at himself in the mirror with a sadistic grin on his face. The man who shaves his own head out of boredom is the man who wants to watch the world burn.
